resources.string: MQTT Patterns. This application provides a simple implementation of an MQTT client capable of one connection at the time, publishing and multiple subscriptions to any given topic. \n \n It supports only a single CA file for SSL/TLS as of this version, however, work is in progress to add a client private key and certificate.

Greenhouse IoT v.1.0
 por @RenatoVelasquez
 velasquez.ren@gmail.com
